name: User can preview markdown when creating a ToDo from the modal

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
1. Open the ToDo RHS
2. Add a ToDO and paste in the test Data
3. Click Preview
inline.testData:
*italics* (or _italics_) 

**bold**

***bold-italic***

~~strikethrough~~

[Check out Mattermost!](https://about.mattermost.com/)


## Large Heading
### Smaller Heading
#### Even Smaller Heading


* item one
* item two
  * item two sub-point


1. Item one
1. Item two
1. item three


- [ ] Item one
- [ ] Item two
- [x] Completed item

inline.description:
1. Open the ToDo RHS
2. Add a ToDO and paste in the test Data
3. Click Preview
inline.testData:
```
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
fmt.Println("Hello, 世界")
}
```

| Left-Aligned | Center Aligned | Right Aligned |
| :------------ |:---------------:| -----:|
| Left column 1 | this text | $100 |
| Left column 2 | is | $10 |
| Left column 3 | centered | $1 |
